TopicTitle: How do I transfer fuel in Career? (1.7)

Articles.Content: I docked two spacecrafts with fuel using Clamp-O-Tron Docking Port Jr. and tried to transfer fuel from one spacecraft to other and it didn`t work. I don`t have buttons on fuel tanks when I select them. (Idk how to explain, sorry for my bad English) What should I do? (I have VAB lvl2, Launchpad lvl2, SPH lvl2 and other buildings lvl1). Should I upgrade something? I also have MH and BG DLCs

Welcome to the forum @RoZZy.

The R&D building needs to be upgraded before you can transfer fuel in career mode. You right click on one tank then hold alt and right click on another.
Moved from Tutorials as it appears to be a Question.
